name: While You Were In
description:
In the land of white collar workers, where cubicle farms are plentiful and news exists only at the water cooler, there exists a strangely shaped office building. Within the depths of this building is a mailroom, and in this mailroom exists a man with a jaw chiseled like steel and eyebrows so intense they may as well have their own characterization. He is also a little nutty. The boss, the big cheese, a man with an ego to pierce the heavens, has decided that enormous eyebrows are out of season, and has shipped a pink slip down to the mailroom.

You play as the disgruntled, loose cannon mailroom employee as he refuses to accept his termination and decides to fight his way through his bootlicking former coworkers to stick it to the man. 

*Many interns were harmed in the making of this game.
